Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurs in the entire event log
Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 is followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 appearing before SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that occur after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 activities that are part of variants leading to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in variants that include at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Ratio of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurring in cases that eventually reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of variants in which Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 appears at least once
Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are followed by another reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases that undergo major revision (i.e., contain SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that occur more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 directly precedes SW-Reviewer Agreed without any intermediate reviewer-related activity
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 appearing in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases
